info.name: Spinal cord, gray matter
info.description: The gray matter of the spinal cord contains the neuropil of the spinal cord: nerve cell bodies, dendrites, axon terminals & synapses.  It is divided into the paired dorsal or posterior horns, paired ventral or anterior horns, paired intermediate gray areas, and the central gray matter that surrounds the central canal.  This gray matter is further subdivided by cytoarchitecture and function into the Rexed's laminae.
